abstract: Profile of Frank Manzo, who has won his 15th national automobile racing championship at age 59; Manzo, who runs construction business, competes in the National Hot Rod Association’s funny car division on weekends.
snippet: Frank Manzo, who just won his 15th national championship at age 59, enjoys relative anonymity in the National Hot Rod Association’s funny car division.
lead_paragraph: Frank Manzo, who just won his 15th national championship at age 59, enjoys relative anonymity in the National Hot Rod Association’s funny car division.

headline.main: Still Flooring It After All These Years
headline.print_headline: Still Flooring It After All These Years
headline.seo: Frank Manzo, Veteran of Drag Racing, Still Loves to Floor It
